entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
